So, I just sent a Bits puzzle NFT on OS/Polygon and it actually worked. It went to @superphiz, but before anyone thinks this is unfair, you must know he mined the vanity address that holds the prize, if he wanted to solve it.. well his puzzle involves a text file as the only clue
If I can't find something by tomorrow at 8 PM EST I will straight up just post it here for free.

Puzzle is post-poned... again.
